III. INVESTIGATION
Rule Code Facility and premises maintenance
Title
Rule Code & CCI Rule 400.4407
Section (1) A facility and premises shall be maintained in a clean,
Description comfortable, and safe condition.
Violation Potential Rule or Statute Violation
Type
Allegation It is alleged that the facility has bed bugs.
Investigation On 2/14/24, I received an email from Complainant 1 stating there
were possible bedbugs in the facility.
Interviews:
Administrator 1
Administrator 1 reported Youth A said there were bed bugs in the
facility on 2/9/24. On 2/9/24, Administrator 1 emailed the Facilities
Management Department to investigate the matter. That same
day, the Facilities Management Department, requested Ecotec
Pest Control to check the unit alleged to have bed bugs on
2/15/24, Ecotec Pest Control found no bed bugs in the unit.
Documents:
• Email from Administrator 1 to Facilities Management
Department: outlined need for services, dated 2/9/24.
• Email from Administrator 1 stating exterminator was
requested, dated 2/9/24.
• Ecotec Pest Control results; confirmed no bed bugs in the
unit dated 2/15/24.
Analysis The agency was given information on 2/9/24 that there were
possible bed bugs in the facility. They requested services on
2/9/24 and services were completed by 2/15/24. Ecotec Pest
Control verified there were no bed bugs in the facility on 2/15/24.
Conclusion Violation Not Established.
2

IV. RECOMMENDATION
Based on investigative findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable
licensing statutes and rules. It is recommended that the current license status be
continued.
